thread.title: Russia to discuss response to U.S. steel, aluminium tariffs - deputy PM

title: Russia to discuss response to U.S. steel, aluminium tariffs - deputy PM
text:
April 6, 2018 / 9:16 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago Russia to discuss response to U.S. steel, aluminium tariffs - deputy PM Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russiaâ€™s government will discuss measures to protect Russian companies from U.S. trade tariffs on steel and aluminium in the coming days, Deputy Prime Minister Arkady Dvorkovich said on Friday. A worker takes control as a bundle of steel rebar is loaded into a truck at the Ariel Metal steel trader warehouse in Podolsk outside Moscow, Russia February 9, 2018. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov 
Russia said in March it will likely prepare a list of restrictions on imported products from the United States in response to the U.S. tariffs. Reporting by Anastasia Lyrchikova; Writing by Jack Stubbs; Editing by Maria Kiselyova
